body.p: Earlier versions of the articles gathered in this issue were presented at the Reset-Dialogues İstanbul Seminars 2012.

İstanbul Seminars are organized annually by Reset-Dialogues on Civilizations in collaboration with İstanbul Bilgi University. İstanbul Seminars 2012 addressed the topic of ‘The Promises of Democracy in Troubled Times’ and took place at İstanbul Bilgi University on 19–24 May 2012.
